kinetic.client

Interface GenericKineticClient

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdvancedKineticClient, KineticAdminClient, KineticClient, KineticP2pClient

    public interface GenericKineticClient
    Generic kinetic raw/advanced interface. Applications may use this interface to communicate with a Kinetic Service directly. Applications must know details of protocol buffer usage for Kinetic in order to use this API effectively.

    In general, Applications should use the API provided in the com.seagate.kinetic.client package for Kinetic operations. The boot-strap API for the Kinetic client operation is KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration).

    See Also:
    Kinetic.Message, KineticClientFactory, KineticClient

    • Method Detail

      • request

        com.seagate.kinetic.common.lib.KineticMessage request(com.seagate.kinetic.common.lib.KineticMessage requestMessage)
                                                      throws KineticException
        Generic kinetic client raw/advanced request interface. Applications may use this interface to send a request to a Kinetic Service directly. Applications must know the details of Kinetic protocol buffer usage in order to use this API effectively.

        In general, Applications should use the API provided in the com.seagate.kinetic.client package. The boot-strap API for the Kinetic client operation is KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration).

        Parameters:
        requestMessage - the request message to the Kinetic service.
        Returns:
        a respond message from the specified request.
        Throws:
        KineticException - if any internal error occurred.
        See Also:
        KineticMessage, KineticClientFactory, KineticClient

      • requestAsync

        <T> void requestAsync(com.seagate.kinetic.common.lib.KineticMessage requestMessage,
                    CallbackHandler<T> callback)
                  throws KineticException
        Generic kinetic asynchronous request operation. This is a variation of the #request(com.seagate.kinetic.proto.Kinetic.Message.Builder) API.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type must be consistent with the corresponding synchronous request method's return type. For example, for an asynchronous get request, the parameter specified must be an Entry type.
        Parameters:
        requestMessage - the request message to the kinetic service.
        callback - Kinetic client runtime invokes the CallbackHandler.onSuccess() when a successful request's response message is available. CallbackHandler.onError(KineticException e) is invoked if any internal error occurs.
        Throws:
        KineticException - if any internal error occurred.
        See Also:
        request(KineticMessage), CallbackHandler, CallbackResult
